EmailTemplate.name: 2019 Dealer Update #17.2019 Dealer Update #17
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins Update - July 25th, 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Sales Bulletins | July 2019
Laseref IV Upgrade
- This Honeywell Sales Bulletin provides special pricing for the installation of the Laseref IV to replace the Laseref II and Laseref III which is expected to be unrepairable in 2020. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2019-06 Rev B <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-06%20Rev B-1 Laseref IV Upgrade for Business Aircraft %28002%29.pdf]]> for Honeywell dealers. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2019-06 for OEM Service Centers <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-06-OEM Laseref IV Upgrade for Business Aircraft FINAL.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/JI2qQ00VCX0ZNE00G000000]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Cabin Management Systems
- The goal of these sales bulletins is to facilitate the dealer’s ability to provide an Ovation Select™ Cabin Management System quote as well as provide a standardized data package for each configuration. - Here are Honeywell Sales Bulletins: - 2019-40 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-40-Ovation-Lite-CMS-Upgrade-for-the-Challenger-Falcon-and-Embraer-Platforms-Rev-Orig.pdf]]> for the Bombardier Challenger 600 / 601 / 604, Dassault Falcon 50 / 900 / 2000 / 7X and Embraer Legacy 600 fleet of aircraft. - 2019-41 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-41-Ovation-Select-CMS-Upgrade-for-EMB-I600-Rev-2.pdf]]> for the Embraer Legacy® 600 family of aircraft. - 2019-42 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-42-Ovation-Select-CMS-Upgrade-for-the-Boeing-Business-Jet-and-VVIP-Aircraft-Rev-2.pdf]]> for the Boeing Business Jet and VVIP fleet of aircraft. - 2019-43 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-43-Ovation-Select-CMS-Upgrade-for-the-F900-and-F2000-Rev-3.pdf]]> for the Dassault Falcon 900 and Falcon 2000 fleet of aircraft. - 2019-44 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2019-44-Ovation-Select-CMS-Upgrade-for-the-Global-Express-Rev-1.pdf]]> for the Bombardier Global Express fleet of aircraft. - Dealers can find 2019 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/JI2qQ00VCX0ZNE00G000000]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
